main event: Observers noted two objects in the sky that changed color during the sighting.
interesting points: The objects changed colors from red to green to white and back to red., The sighting lasted for 15 to 20 minutes., Observers described the objects as being about the size of a bright star., The objects exhibited erratic, hovering motions before disappearing suddenly., The weather conditions were clear with visibility over 15 miles at the time of the sighting.
sighted object: two color-changing lights in the sky
witness description: Civilian, adult, occupation as a secretary
